thread.title: BRIEF-Guyana Goldfields Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.08

title: BRIEF-Guyana Goldfields Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.08
text: February 23, 2018 / 12:44 PM / in 4 minutes BRIEF-Guyana Goldfields Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.08 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 23 (Reuters) - Guyana Goldfields Inc: * GUYANA GOLDFIELDS INC. PRODUCES 160,500 OUNCES OF GOLD IN 2017; GENERATING US$200M IN REVENUE AND COMPLETING THE YEAR WITH RECORD LOW COSTS * GUYANA GOLDFIELDS INC QTRLY GOLD PRODUCTION OF 48,900 OUNCES * GUYANA GOLDFIELDS INC QTRLY OPERATING COSTS, INCLUDING DEPRECIATION AND ROYALTY, OF $752 PER OUNCE * GUYANA GOLDFIELDS INC QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.08 * GUYANA GOLDFIELDS INC QTRLY REVENUE $61.4 MILLION VERSUS $54.8 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
